last_episode_to_air.name: Novissima Solis
last_episode_to_air.overview: The team finally faces the Dark One in a treacherous battle that will affect the fate of humanity.

name: Van Helsing
overview: Vanessa Helsing, the daughter of famous vampire hunter and Dracula nemesis Abraham Van Helsing is resurrected five years in the future to find out that vampires have taken over the world and that she possesses unique power over them. She is humanity’s last hope to lead an offensive to take back what has been lost.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After a catastrophic volcano eruption, the last remaining underground vampires rise up through a dark, ash-filled sky to overtake America. Vanessa Van Helsing, a descendant of the legendary line of vampire hunters, awakens from a three-year coma to discover that she’s not only immune to the bloodthirsty predators – but also has the ability to make them human again.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two of Van Helsing pushes Vanessa and the other Survivors further into the world of the vampire apocalypse, where they discover old alliances have crumbled and new connections expose long-buried secrets about the Rising, the Van Helsing heritage, and the survival of humankind itself.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: The first of four vampire Elders has been freed (although it proves itself to be loyal to the Van Helsing clan) and legend has it that when their four Totems are combined the Dark One will be resurrected. Now it's a race against time as Vanessa and her ragtag group of heroes faces off against the forces of darkness.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Sam has fulfilled his destiny to become the 4th Elder & now our post-apocalyptic world is even closer to seeing the Dark One resurrected. Vanessa vows to follow the light & fight the darkness that has taken everything she loves. Just when she thought she was alone in her mission she meets two young women, Violet and Jack-who have unique and mysterious vampire fighting abilities all their own.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Vanessa, Violet, and Jack will risk it all to finally bring an end to the Dark One once and for all. The Van Helsings must figure out ways to escape and evade the various obstacles in their path to prevent them from their mission, leading to an epic final showdown between the Van Helsings and the Dark One. Who will win the battle between light and dark?

episodes.name: Help Me
episodes.overview: Vanessa Helsing, a distant relative of the famous vampire hunter Abraham Van Helsing is resurrected, but soon realizes that the world was conquered by vampires. Tya is humanity's last hope to lead people to regain their lost.

episodes.name: Seen You
episodes.overview: In the days leading up to "The Rising," Vanessa is attacked and left for dead by an intruder. When Doc discovers anomalies in Vanessa's bloodwork, Axel and the Marines come to retrieve the body, only to become marooned in the hospital when all hell breaks loose outside the building.

episodes.name: Stay Inside
episodes.overview: The hospital's power source is damaged, jeopardizing the protective UV lights. Vanessa and Axel head into Seattle to scavenge parts, leaving the others to fight against the vampires amongst themselves.

episodes.name: Coming Back
episodes.overview: Vanessa and Mohamad head into the vampire-controlled streets in search of Vanessa's daughter; Cynthia is found dead at the hospital, and Doc thinks her apparent suicide is actually a deliberate murder; Vanessa is captured by vampires.

episodes.name: Fear Her
episodes.overview: Vanessa, now in the clutches of Julius and his vampire brood, is forced to demonstrate her powers; the refugees discover a serial killer among the residents, and plot to wrestle control from Axel.

episodes.name: Nothing Matters
episodes.overview: Vanessa and Susan are pursued through the sewers by mutated feral  vampires and arrive back at the safety of the hospital only to find the  aftermath of a hostile takeover. Vanessa hatches a plan to take it back  by force.

episodes.name: For Me
episodes.overview: Vanessa and Axel lead the others in the hospital's last stand against a  siege by Julius and his vampire soldiers. Later when Dmitri's vampire  'Death Squad' arrives, it looks like civil war is brewing among the two  vampire factions.

episodes.name: Little Thing
episodes.overview: Axel leads the surviving members of their group towards his old military base for shelter but finds it abandoned and in disrepair. With vampires closing in all around them, Axel decides they need a safer refuge and decides to go underground. Separated from Vanessa and the group, Mohamad tries to catch up while navigating hostile territory.

episodes.name: Help Out
episodes.overview: The group is trapped inside an underground lab for military experiments, and Vanessa discovers that Axel has been hiding a secret about her past; Mohamad befriends a girl who doesn't fear vampires; Rebecca makes a calculated play.

episodes.name: Stay Away
episodes.overview: Still reeling from the dire events of 'The Farm', Vanessa and the group find refuge among a band of humans who have bargained with vampires for peace. Their leader, however, appears to be hiding a terrible secret. Meanwhile, the true serial killer among Vanessa's group is finally revealed.

episodes.name: Last Time
episodes.overview: Vanessa and the group take shelter in Susan's family farm, where drastic action is taken against Sam; Rebecca's latest experiment to create Daywalkers fails, and Dmitri's patience grows thin.

episodes.name: He's Coming
episodes.overview: While on the road to a vampire-controlled camp, Vanessa and Mohamad find themselves in a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse against Sam. Sheema discovers a secret that can bring down the ghetto-cell of the Resistance, while Julius takes a clandestine meeting with Dmitri. Ultimately, Vanessa and Mohamad walk into a trap that places one of them in great peril.

episodes.name: It Begins
episodes.overview: Now in Dmitri and Rebecca's clutches, Vanessa learns secrets from her past and finds herself at a crossroads; Flesh and the Resistance accelerate their timeline to rescue Vanessa; Mohamad and Sheema finally come to blows over their allegiances.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After a catastrophic volcano eruption, the last remaining underground vampires rise up through a dark, ash-filled sky to overtake America. Vanessa Van Helsing, a descendant of the legendary line of vampire hunters, awakens from a three-year coma to discover that she’s not only immune to the bloodthirsty predators – but also has the ability to make them human again.

episodes.name: Began Again
episodes.overview: Vanessa and Mohamad search for Dylan as Dmitri's citadel crumbles around them; Flesh acquires an unexpected ally in one of the Resistance Fighters; Taka clashes with the Vampire Elite.

episodes.name: In Redemption
episodes.overview: Vanessa fights to get her daughter out of the citadel; Dmitri and Antanasia hatch a plot to stop Vanessa; Mohamad risks his life to save Vanessa and Dylan.

episodes.name: Love Bites
episodes.overview: Vanessa makes a horrific decision to save her daughter; Axel and a former ally struggle to survive in the wild; a group of juvenile delinquents come face to face with a sadistic vampire.

episodes.name: A Home
episodes.overview: Vanessa encounters a group of vampires whose gruesome methods bring savagery to a new level;  Sam continues his game with the  juvenile delinquents and that has deadly consequences.

episodes.name: Save Yourself
episodes.overview: Vanessa faces off against Sam in a bloody showdown; Dmitri hears news that sends him on a warpath after Vanessa; Flesh, Mohamad and Lucky take desperate steps to save their lives.

episodes.name: Veritas Vincit
episodes.overview: Vanessa’s past rushes back to confront her in an unexpected way; a secret that Doc has been protecting is revealed; and in a bid to bolster his power, Dmitri sends Scab on an impossible mission.

episodes.name: Everything Changes
episodes.overview: Vanessa faces off with Dmitri; Axel fights against becoming a full-fledged vampire; Sam tracks Mohamad, Flesh and Lucky; Scab tries to enlist a fierce group of vampires to join Dmitri.

episodes.name: Big Mama
episodes.overview: As the group struggles with the disappearance of one of its own, they accept sanctuary in a town run by its Sheriff and his troops; Dmitri inches closer to achieving his darkest goal.

episodes.name: Wakey, Wakey
episodes.overview: A tense standoff between law enforcement and the survivors erupts into a bloodbath; in a bid to evade a vicious breed of vampire, Axel and Scarlett find themselves hunted like prey.

episodes.name: Base Pair
episodes.overview: A mystery unravels when an organization fighting to find a cure for vampirism enlists the help of someone in the group; old loyalties are put to the test with deadly results.

episodes.name: Be True
episodes.overview: Sam and Mohamad's shared past comes back to haunt them in more ways than one; at a secluded campsite in the woods, friendships are put through a baptism by fire.

episodes.name: Crooked Falls
episodes.overview: While the rest of the group fight for survival, Axel and Scarlett defend a mountain stronghold against a relentless foe; Doc makes a medical discovery that could change everything.

episodes.name: Black Days
episodes.overview: At a mountain stronghold, secrets of the Van Helsing family are unearthed and the true face of evil is exposed; a climactic battle between humans and vampires leaves humanity's fate in question.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two of Van Helsing pushes Vanessa and the other Survivors further into the world of the vampire apocalypse, where they discover old alliances have crumbled and new connections expose long-buried secrets about the Rising, the Van Helsing heritage, and the survival of humankind itself.

episodes.name: Fresh Tendrils
episodes.overview: Vanessa is once again resurrected and must confront her family's legacy; Axel, Scarlett and the others fend off Blak Tek's forces, who hope to add Scarlett to their list of lab rats.

episodes.name: Super Unknown
episodes.overview: To find its totem, the First Elder brings Vanessa, Scarlett and Axel to an abandoned insane asylum protected by powerful vampires, where they discover the legacy of a long dead Van Helsing relative.

episodes.name: I Awake
episodes.overview: Vanessa relives the memories of her ancestor, Lily Van Helsing, in Colonial Hong Kong. There, she learns to control her dark side and fights the B'ah, the second vampire Elder.

episodes.name: Rusty Cage
episodes.overview: Sam comes to realize his dark destiny and tries to groom Mohamad to be a worthy partner. Scab and Ivory are bestowed Daywalker powers and return home to find the Sisterhood in ruins.

episodes.name: Pretty Noose
episodes.overview: In San Francisco, Vanessa, Scarlett and Axel find and battle against the Second Elder's forces. In Denver, Flesh, Doc, Julius and Jolene rejoin American civilization as best they can.

episodes.name: Like Suicide
episodes.overview: Vanessa has a final showdown with the Second Elder in San Francisco. In Denver, Flesh, Doc, Julius and Jolene learn that even in a Safe-Zone, life isn't easy.

episodes.name: Hunted Down
episodes.overview: Sam approaches his destiny. Mohamad tries to escape his servitude and imprisonment. Axel leads the San Francisco refugees to Denver. Ivory and Scab assume control of the Daywalker horde.

episodes.name: Crooked Steps
episodes.overview: On a distant island, Vanessa and Scarlett battle the Third Elder; Vanessa makes a choice about her path forward, one that Scarlett does not agree with.

episodes.name: Loud Love
episodes.overview: Doc and Jolene clash with Denver authorities over the repellent; Flesh chooses to face his past; Axel struggles with leaving Scarlett behind; Ivory and the Sisterhood infiltrate Denver.

episodes.name: Outside World
episodes.overview: Vanessa, trapped in an abandoned slaughterhouse, wrestles between the light and dark sides of her own self before she can move forward on her path to find the Final Elder.

episodes.name: Been Away
episodes.overview: In his hometown, Axel fights both his tragic past and a vicious pack of Daywalkers. Sam can't find Mohamad, and takes his anger out on Chad and Mike.

episodes.name: Christ Pose
episodes.overview: Scarlett is reunited with Axel but he is badly injured before they can find Vanessa. A mysterious man helps them find their way. Flesh and Jolene are fugitives on the run from Blaktek.

episodes.name: Birth Ritual
episodes.overview: Vanessa and Sam face off to find the Last Elder, with Scarlett, Axel and Mohamad caught in the crossfire.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: The first of four vampire Elders has been freed (although it proves itself to be loyal to the Van Helsing clan) and legend has it that when their four Totems are combined the Dark One will be resurrected. Now it's a race against time as Vanessa and her ragtag group of heroes faces off against the forces of darkness.

episodes.name: Dark Destiny
episodes.overview: With the amulet in hand, Vanessa and Lily escape from Elder Sam and return to the real world.

episodes.name: Dark Ties
episodes.overview: After Violet's attack, Julius and Doc find information that Hansen will do anything to keep quiet.

episodes.name: Love Less
episodes.overview: A grieving and aimless Axel rescues an enigmatic Max, who returns the favor with a job offer.

episodes.name: Broken Promises
episodes.overview: After an epic battle, Axel reconciles with Vanessa and comes to terms with the death of Scarlett.

episodes.name: Liberty or Death
episodes.overview: Sam and the Brides arrive at Fort Collins, where Hansen reveals a secret for raising the Dark One.

episodes.name: Miles and Miles
episodes.overview: In an infested desert, Flesh and Axel chase a crazed Max, who has held Jennifer and Owen hostage.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis
episodes.overview: Three generations of Van Helsings come together before a showdown with Elder Sam and the Oracle.

episodes.name: The Prism
episodes.overview: 3 Pages are key to raising or destroying the Dark One, but only Hansen knows where they are hidden.

episodes.name: No 'I' in Team
episodes.overview: In a flashback to the Rising, Jack and her archers battle vampires that are taking over the city.

episodes.name: Together Forever
episodes.overview: Violet is captured by a sadistic ringmaster and must battle her way out of his gladiator arena.

episodes.name: All Apologies
episodes.overview: Now that Violet knows where the 3 Pages are, she returns to Fort Collins with Axel and Julius.

episodes.name: Three Pages
episodes.overview: As the sisters prepare to open the portal to the Dark One, Hansen makes the ultimate sacrifice.

episodes.name: The Beholder
episodes.overview: The President and Ivory try to decipher what really happened in the Dark Realm.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Sam has fulfilled his destiny to become the 4th Elder & now our post-apocalyptic world is even closer to seeing the Dark One resurrected. Vanessa vows to follow the light & fight the darkness that has taken everything she loves. Just when she thought she was alone in her mission she meets two young women, Violet and Jack-who have unique and mysterious vampire fighting abilities all their own.

episodes.name: Past Tense
episodes.overview: After waking in the Dark Realm, Jack is sent through a portal with only the words to guide her.

episodes.name: Old Friends
episodes.overview: Jack joins forces with her once-sworn enemy, who reveals a dangerous weapon that will help the Van Helsing's kill the Dark One, but the consequences of using this weapon are dire.

episodes.name: Lumina Intunecata
episodes.overview: Jack faces off against the Dark One with a new ally whose allegiances may not be trusted.

episodes.name: State of the Union
episodes.overview: Axel and Julius awaken in the Sunshine Unit, where a familiar face reveals the truth about their injuries. At Fort Collins, Violet and Ivory must convince their captors they are not traitors.

episodes.name: Sisterhunt
episodes.overview: Violet and Ivory are on the run from Fort Collins with the now vulnerable Sisterhood. Violet must risk everything to keep the amulet out of The Dark One's hands.

episodes.name: Carpe Noctis
episodes.overview: While on the Van Helsing trail, Axel and Julius meet Nina — an important figure from Julius' past, but is she as innocent as he remembers?

episodes.name: Graveyard Smash
episodes.overview: As Axel and Julius continue their search for the Van Helsings, Violet and Ivory try to decipher a new clue all the while staying one step ahead of The Dark One.

episodes.name: Deep Trouble
episodes.overview: Axel, Violet, Jack and Ivory are on their way to D.C. when an attack from the military leads them to take cover in an abandoned mine. But the mine may not be as safe as they think.

episodes.name: The Doorway
episodes.overview: Vanessa wills Axel into The Dark Realm where they both discover secrets of their past that may help them in the future.

episodes.name: E Pluribus Unum
episodes.overview: Axel and Violet inadvertently save an important figure from America's past who could help them turn the tide in their fight against The Dark One.

episodes.name: Undercover Mother
episodes.overview: As The Dark One yearns to release her full power upon the real world, her plans are interrupted by a strange visitor to the White House.

episodes.name: The Voices
episodes.overview: Vanessa, Axel, Jack, Violet and Ivory finally reunite in the real world and begin their plan to take down The Dark One.

episodes.name: Novissima Solis
episodes.overview: The team finally faces the Dark One in a treacherous battle that will affect the fate of humanity.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Vanessa, Violet, and Jack will risk it all to finally bring an end to the Dark One once and for all. The Van Helsings must figure out ways to escape and evade the various obstacles in their path to prevent them from their mission, leading to an epic final showdown between the Van Helsings and the Dark One. Who will win the battle between light and dark?
